description:
The Odd Jobs trio finds themselves watching after an old-fashioned and empty barber store called Kamiyuidoko. As they look over at the newly opened beauty parlor across the street, they see Kondo, who has been denied service! When the depressed Kondo enters Kamiyuidoko, the Odd Jobs trio find themselves in an awkward position, particularly since they don’t know how to cut hair. Disguising themselves, the gang tries to make Kondo leave, but after seeing his haggard face Shinpachi and Kagura take pity and invite him in. It’s time for an insecure man whose popularity is overshadowed among good-looking men to get a makeover!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Conversation with a Barber During a Haircut Is the Most Pointless Thing in The World
Kamigiri Nagara Kawasareru Biyoushi to no Kaiwa wa Sekai de Ichiban Dou de mo Ii
髪切りながら交わされる美容師との会話は世界で一番どうでもいい
